prep-cmd.do: cmd \/C powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { Import-Module WindowsDisplayManager; $p = WindowsDisplayManager\GetPrimaryDisplay; $ok = $p.SetResolution(1280,800,60); if ($ok) { exit 0 } else { exit 1 } }"
prep-cmd.undo: cmd \/C powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { Import-Module WindowsDisplayManager; $p = WindowsDisplayManager\GetPrimaryDisplay; $ok = $p.SetResolution(3840,2160,60); if ($ok) { exit 0 } else { exit 1 } }"
